          <title>
            <string language="hu">II. Komnénosz János császár és Eiréné császászárné az Istenanya mellett, 1118. körül, Konstantinápoly, Hagia Sophia, Mozaik.</string>
            <string language="en">John II. Comnenos emperor and Eirene empress near the Godmother, around 1118, Constantinople, Hagia Sophia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">John II. Comnenos Kaiser und Eirene Kaiserin
nahe der Patin, herum 1118, Konstantinopolis, Hagia Sophia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">John II. Empereur de Comnenos et 
impératrice d'Eirene près de la marraine, autour 1118, 
Constantinople, Hagia Sophia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">John II. Emperor de Comnenos e empress perto
do godmother, ao redor 1118 de Eirene, Constantinople, Hagia Sophia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">John II. Imperatore di Comnenos ed empress 
vicino al godmother, intorno 1118, Constantinople, Hagia Sophia di 
Eirene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Ιοχν ΙΙ. Αυτοκράτορας Comnenos και Eirene 
αυτοκράτειρα κοντά στη νονά, περίπου 1118, Κωνσταντινούπολη, 
Hagia Sophia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juan II. Emperador de Comnenos y empress 
cerca de la madrina, alrededor 1118, Constantinople, Hagia Sophia de 
Eirene</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Hagia Sophia templom mozaikja, II Komnénosz János császár és a császárné.</string>
            <string language="en">Mosaic of temple Hagia Sophia, John II  Comnenos emperor, empress</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Hagia Sophia,  Konstantinápoly,  bizánci építészet,  bizánci művészet,  12. század,  </string>
            <string language="en">Hagia Sophia, Constaninople, byzantine architecture, byzantine art, 12th century</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mosaik des Bügels Hagia Sophia, John II Comnenos 
Kaiser, Kaiserin</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mosaïque de temple Hagia Sophia, empereur de John
II Comnenos, impératrice</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mosaic do temple Hagia Sophia, emperor de John II 
Comnenos, empress</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mosaico del tempiale Hagia Sophia, imperatore del
John II Comnenos, empress</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μωσαϊκό του ναού Hagia Sophia, John ΙΙ 
Comnenos αυτοκράτορας, αυτοκράτειρα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mosaico del templo Hagia Sophia, emperador de 
Juan II Comnenos, empress</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hagia Sophia, Constaninople, byzantinische Architektur, 
byzantinische kunst, 12. Jahrhundert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hagia Sophia, Constaninople, architecture bizantine, art

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hagia Sophia, Constaninople, arquitetura byzantine, arte

            <string language="x-mt-it">Hagia Sophia, Constaninople, architettura byzantine,

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hagia Sophia, Constaninople, configuración byzantine, 
arte byzantine, 12mo siglo</string>
